long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Make sharing links easy with Instashare! Instashare is an email-enabled browser plugin that allows you to easily share websites with your favorite people. Instead of copying and pasting or searching the page for a share button, Instashare provides access to your favorite contacts with two simple clicks. Simply open the extension, select the person you want to send to, and voila! It integrates seamlessly with your favorite email client to ensure your sharing experience is personal.

Features:
- Two click share for any web page
- Easily add and delete contacts
- Syncs your contacts across devices using your Google account

Note: this app is currently in beta. If you find any bugs or wish to submit feedback, please contact us!
